title: Elote (Grilled Mexican Corn Salad)
instructions: Grill the corn, turning occasionally, until charred and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes.
Remove corn from grill and let cool slightly, then cut kernels off the cob.
In a large bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sour cream, cotija cheese, chili powder, smoked paprika, garlic powder, and lime juice.
Add the grilled corn kernels and cilantro to the bowl and toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve warm or at room temperature, garnished with extra cheese and cilantro if desired.
notes: You can substitute feta cheese for cotija if needed.
